name: rebase

body.origin:
|- wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
-| wss(cr, cc)
-| wi(wss(cr, cc), wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ℝ =(Base ` RRfld)
⊣ ℝ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ (ℝ ⊆ ℂ → ℝ =(Base ` RRfld))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
-| wss(cr, cc)
-| wi(wss(cr, cc), wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℝ =(Base ` RRfld)
⊣ ℝ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ (ℝ ⊆ ℂ → ℝ =(Base ` RRfld))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
-| wi(wss(cr, cc), wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(cr, cc), wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld)))
-| wceq(crefld, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
-| wceq(cc, cfv(cbs, ccnfld))
body.pretty:
⊢ (ℝ ⊆ ℂ → ℝ =(Base ` RRfld))
⊣ RRfld =(CCfld[|`s]ℝ)
⊣ ℂ =(Base ` CCfld)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
-| wceq(crefld, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
-| wceq(cc, cfv(cbs, ccnfld))

|- wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld))
-| wceq(cc, cfv(cbs, ccnfld))

comment: The base of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)
